messages.messageBody:
on 7/22/03 10:49 AM, Earthmomma67@... at Earthmomma67@... wrote:

> Why was this removed? It seemed to be really helpful to the "atmosphere" of
> the list.

Something Helen did when she was creating new lists. She likes things
simple.

If you'd like to tell her how helpful you felt it was, her email is at the
bottom of the emails.

Joyce
Unschooling-Discussion moderator
